div.p: Unless otherwise indicated in a note, the physical location of the originals of all images is the same as that of the text transcribed. That location is given in the document information for each letter. The originals of most images provided here are stored in the Royal Botanic Gardens Victoria library and are the copyright of the Royal Botanic Gardens Board. These images, as are those provided by other rights holders, are published under a Creative Commons Attribution Non-commercial ShareAlike 4.0 international licence ( CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 ). Usage under this licence is summarised here .

In some cases, third parties who hold copyright for images have chosen to retain their reproduction rights. These cases are indicated in the notes accompanying the image. In such cases, written permission from the copyright holder is required prior to copying, reproducing or using this material.
